00018 #ifndef ADJACENCYMATRIX_H
00019 #define ADJACENCYMATRIX_H
00020 
00021 #include "stdincludes.h"
00022 
00026 template<int M>
00027 class AdjacencyMatrix : public Eigen::Matrix<double,M,M> {
00028 public:
00029 
00030   void shortest_paths_tree(int, Eigen::Matrix<int,M,1> &,
00031                            Eigen::Matrix<double,M,1> &);
00032   void shortest_spanning_tree(int &, Eigen::Matrix<int,M,1> &);
00033 
00034 };
00035 
00036 
00047 template<int M>
00048 void AdjacencyMatrix<M>::shortest_paths_tree(int root, 
00049                                           Eigen::Matrix<int,M,1> &predecessor,
00050                                           Eigen::Matrix<double,M,1> &cost) {
00051   int i;
00052   int freeVertices;
00053   int closestNode;
00054   double dist;
00055   Eigen::Matrix<bool,M,1>     isFree;
00056 
00057   // --- initialise
00058   for(i=0; i<M; i++) {
00059     predecessor(i) = -1;
00060     cost(i) = std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity();
00061     isFree(i) = true;
00062   }
00063   cost(root)= 0;
00064 
00065   for(freeVertices = M; freeVertices > 0; --freeVertices) {
00066     // --- find closest node
00067     dist = std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity();
00068     for(i = 0; i<M; i++) {
00069       if(isFree(i) && cost(i) < dist) {
00070         dist = cost(i);
00071         closestNode = i;
00072       }
00073     }
00074     isFree[closestNode] = false;
00075 
00076     // --- relax neighbours of closestNode
00077     for(i=0; i<M; i++) {
00078       if(isFree[i] && cost[i] > dist+(*this)(closestNode,i)) {
00079         cost[i] = dist+(*this)(closestNode,i);
00080         predecessor[i] = closestNode;
00081       }
00082     }
00083   }
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00096 template<int M>
00097 void AdjacencyMatrix<M>::shortest_spanning_tree(int &root, 
00098                                         Eigen::Matrix<int,M,1> &predecessor) {
00099   Eigen::Matrix<double,M,1> cost;
00100   Eigen::Matrix<int,M,1> rooted_tree;
00101   double min_cost;
00102   int r,i;
00103 
00104   min_cost = std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity();
00105   for(r = 0; r<M; ++r) {
00106     shortest_paths_tree(r, rooted_tree, cost);
00107     for(i=0; i<M; ++i) {
00108       if(cost(i) <= min_cost) {
00109         min_cost = cost(i);
00110         root = r;
00111         predecessor = rooted_tree;
00112       }
00113     }
00114   }
00115 }

00117 #endif
